info.description: Definitions for Service Management Container and sub-resources used by Azure Operator Service Manager (AOSM) Multi-Site. AOSM is a service enabling network operators to perform lifecycle management of telecom infrastructure.
info.title: HybridNetworkManagementClient

preCheck.description: Pre-action to be applied to rollout tiers.

gates.description: Post-actions to be applied to rollout tiers.

GateAction.description: Actions to be associated with an individual rollout site.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

systemData.description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the rollout resource.

rolloutSequenceReference.description: Reference to the RolloutSequence to be used when creating the Rollout.  This is valid only at creation: changes to the created Rollout can be made through `rolloutTiers`.

restrictions.description: List of Tiers/SiteNetworkServices that should be excluded from this UpdateSpecification
List of Tiers/SiteNetworkServices that should be excluded from this UpdateSpecification

rolloutInfo.description: Overall state and metadata of the rollout.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

systemData.description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

RolloutSequence.description: An object describing the sequence of operations in a rollout.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the rollout script resource.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

systemData.description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the rollout tier resource.

RolloutTierActionProperties.description: Properties of a rollout tier action.

inTierActions.description: Actions to perform between SiteNetworkServices within a RolloutTier.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

systemData.description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the ServiceManagementContainer.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

systemData.description: The system meta data relating to this resource.

UpdateSpecification.description: An object describing changes to be applied to every site in the rollout.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the UpdateSpecification.

restrictions.description: List of Tiers/SiteNetworkServices that should be excluded from this UpdateSpecification

publisherName.description: The publisher name for the site network service.

existingNetworkServiceDesignGroupName.description: The current network service design group name for the site network service.

newNetworkServiceDesignGroupName.description: The desired network service design group name for the site network service.

existingNetworkServiceDesignVersionName.description: The current network service design version for the site network service.

newNetworkServiceDesignVersionName.description: The desired network service design version for the site network service.

networkServiceDesignVersionOfferingLocat.description: The location of the network service design offering.

NetworkServiceDesignVersionChange.description: Change to network service design version.

Gate.description: Action to be performed after a SiteNetworkService is converged.

actionType.description: Type of the Gate; one of WaitingGate or ManualGate.

durationInMinutes.description: Time in minutes AOSM should wait before proceeding to the next SiteNetworkService, only applicable when Gate is a WaitingGate.

PreCheck.description: Behavior modifiers or pre-actions executed before convergence on the SiteNetworkService begins.

RolloutTierSnapshot.description: Representation of a rollout tier progress.

excludedSiteNetworkServices.description: List of excluded SiteNetworkServices from the tier.

RolloutTierStatus.description: Representation of a rollout tier's status.

excludedSiteNetworkServices.description: List of excluded SiteNetworkServices from the tier.

rolloutInfo.description: State and metadata of the tier.

SiteNetworkServiceSnapshot.description: Representation of an individual site's rollout progress, including its SNS, pre-action and post-action

preCheck.description: The pre-action associated with the site.

gates.description: The post-actions associated with the site.

SiteNetworkServiceStatus.description: Representation of an individual site's rollout status, including its SNS, pre-action and post-action and their statuses

rolloutInfo.description: State and metadata of the Rollout action.

preCheck.description: Status of the pre-action associated with the site.

gates.description: Statuses of the post-actions associated with the site.

rolloutInfo.description: An object containing status and metadata of a rollout.

status.description: Status of an individual rollout action.

startTime.description: Start time of the rollout action.

endTime.description: End time of the rollout action.

lastUpdatedTime.description: Last updated time of the rollout action.
